name: Max Continuous Barrier Length (m)
functionStatement: Barriers occur only in short segments with frequent passable gaps.
descriptionMarkdown: Length of the longest uninterrupted levee/berm/wall segment along either bank (lower is better).
howToMeasureMarkdown: Dissolve mapped barriers by continuity; compute maximum segment length.
